page.title: 03Great Croft and Middle Croft
page.content:
These houses built{l978-9,}are Duke of Sutherland design. Altogether there are nine houses. The land was owned by a resident of Tibberton.
The houses down{Great Croft}sell for about Â£42,000 and the{Middle Croft houses for about Â£72,000.Five of the houses are still owned by the original owners.
Four of the{men}work in Telford, 3 travel and l works in Newport. Four of the{women}work outside Tibberton. All the families have children of school age. There are not any retired people.
All families might move depending on employment. There are eighteen cars altogether and there are not enough garages.
